title: patch 7.4 and MacBook pro issue
body:
I'm using my MacBook Pro to play LOL 
it was working very well until the new client was released 

now when I play,  I must keep the mouse moving the whole time, or the screen will freeze.

MacBook Pro (Retina, 13-inch, Late 2013)
2.6 GHz Intel Core i5
8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3
Intel Iris 1536 MB

what should I do?

replies.body:
There could be a setting with your OS that's causing the game to stutter or freeze.  Try the below steps as a starting point to troubleshoot.

Go to your Accessibility Menu:

- Open up your System Preferences, head into Accessibility (little blue icon with 2 people on it).
- From the Vision Menu, click on "Display" and disable "Shake Mouse Pointer to Locate"
- From the Interacting Menu, click on "Mouse & Trackpad" and toggle "Ignore built-in trackpad when..."

Let me know if  it works!
